front.title: Terms Used in IPv6 over the TSCH mode of IEEE 802.15.4e

author.organization: Univ. of Sci. and Tech. Beijing

abstract.t: This document provides a glossary of terminology used in IPv6 over the TSCH mode of IEEE 802.15.4e (6TiSCH). This document extends existing terminology documents for Low-power and Lossy Networks.
